By risk_breaker on Wednesday, April 29, 2009 - 04:01 am:

i want to know how to get a main breed

can i get it by combining 2 monsters with the same

main breed like beaklon/zuum and beaklon/golem??

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, April 29, 2009 - 09:56 am:

Yes, as long as it doesn't have to be unlocked. In your example, Beaklon is unlocked from the game's start, so you're ok.
